org.mt4j.util.camera
Class Frustum

java.lang.Object
  org.mt4j.util.camera.Frustum
All Implemented Interfaces:
IFrustum
public class Frustum
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFrustum

The Class Frustum. Represents a camera frustum. Can be used to check whether a point or a sphere lies in the frustum (is visible). This is based off code from lighthouse3d.

Author:
Christopher Ruff

                      float yUp,

Re/Sets the frustum to the specified camera values.

Parameters:
camPos - the camera position
viewCenterPos - the view center pos (look at)
xUp - the x up vector
yUp - the y up vector
zUp - the z up vector
